news.title: Pentagon to become largest shareholder in rare earth miner MP Materials; shares surge 60%
news.summary: Interior Secretary Doug Burgum said in April the Trump administration was considering equity investments in critical mineral producers to compete with China. Burgum: "We need to make sure that we have the resources that we need to compete"

news.title: Ferrero to buy cereal maker WK Kellogg for $3.1 billion; Kellogg shares jump 30%
news.summary: The standalone cereal business WK Kellogg began trading in 2023. It will be the world's largest maker of breakfast cereals. The company is expected to be worth more than $20 billion by 2018.

news.title: Delta shares jump 10% after airline reinstates 2025 profit outlook as CEO says bookings stabilized
news.summary: Delta cut its 2025 forecast after tariffs and hesitant consumers hit the brakes on trips this year. Delta: Tariffs, hesitant consumers have led to a slowdown in air travel.

news.title: America's Top States for Business 2025: The full rankings
news.summary: CNBC unveils its 19th annual America's Top States for Business ranking. It scores all 50 states on 128 different metrics in 10 key categories of competitiveness.

news.title: Trump's 'big beautiful bill' cuts food stamps for millions — the average family may lose $146 per month, report finds
news.summary: A new law includes the largest-ever cuts to Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program benefits. Here's how much that may reduce what families can spend on food.

news.title: Palantir’s stock is up 400% in a year. Here’s why one vocal bull sees more gains ahead.
news.summary: The company stands to benefit from growing commercial and federal demand for its artificial intelligence platform, Wedbush analysts say. The company is expected to report results for the first quarter of 2014 on Monday.

news.title: The SALT deduction is now much more generous. Here’s how to get the most out of the tax break.
news.summary: The new SALT deduction is a write-off for state and local taxes. Here's what you need to know about the new law. How does the new Salt deduction work?

news.title: Airline stocks soar, lifted by Delta’s earnings beat and restored full-year guidance
news.summary: Delta Air Lines Inc. stock shot up toward a four-month high in premarket trading Thursday. Air carrier topped Wall Street’s estimates for second-quarter profit and revenue and restored its full-year guidance.

news.title: ‘I do all the yard work, cooking and cleaning’: I live with my daughter and her lazy boyfriend. She wants me to buy her house. Do I say yes?
news.summary: “When I say anything, I am immediately wrong, unless my daughter wants something,” he says. “When he says anything, he is immediately wrong.”

news.title: A $500 billion wall of money will lift the stock market in the second half, says JPMorgan
news.summary: JPMorgan strategists say retail investors will help drive stock gains this year. Foreign investors could pitch in, too, the bank says.
